subject: Re: Website colour changes
preview: Hi Mark, Confirming that we have fixed the mobile version too. We will be waiting for your further instruction on when to push this to live.

full_threads.body:
Hi Mark, 

Confirming that we have fixed the mobile version too. We will be waiting for your further instruction on when to push this to live.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body: Done fixing the spacing between the letters madam @rica

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Thanks Rica, you have nailed the colours, looks great!!

On the mobile version there is still strange spacing between the letters in Thrive Surgical...would it fix it if the words were just put next to each other (instead of how it is now with surgical underneath thrive).

Please hold off going live for now as I am still sorting out workplace issues at my current practice.

Many thanks
Mark.

Hi Mark, 

Thank you for sending the details. Confirming that we have made the changes. Could you please check it now?

Here is the link: https://staging-drmarkboccola.kinsta.cloud/

Let us know if you would like to do further changes.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

Thankyou, I find those colours work really well.

1. The pea soup colour is still appearing in a couple of places:
- square behind the hospital photo
- other service banner at bottom of gallstone, anti-reflux etc pages

Can you please change them to the lightest shade of green on the colour palette from my last email? Please see attached photos.

2. As you can see on the attachments, the logo at the top & bottom of the page, where it says "Thrive" there is a large space between "R" & the ""I" and for the word Surgical" there is a large space between the "I" and "C" this is much more pronounced on the mobile version but also present on the desktop version- could this please be corrected?

3. Can you please change the main photo on the mobile version to the one of me in a suit with nice background to match what you've done on the desktop version?

4. On the homepage next to my photo where it says Bariatric & Upper GI Surgeon Sydney" could you please remove the word "Sydney"

Thankyou!
Mark.

attachments.filename: square behind hospital pea soup colour.jpg

full_threads.body:
Hi Mark, 

Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: https://staging-drmarkboccola.kinsta.cloud/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
hi @heath please check the updates for the colors

15mins madam @rica

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Glen Tenorio
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

It looks better, but still not quite right, the 3 big boxes sort of blur into one another, it doesn't really work as well in green as it did in blue.

Can I please have one last change of palette? I've asked family and friends and the general consensus is that it looks better with this new colour palette I've attached (I found it on pinterest).

Promise I won't change my mind after this, I've had enough.

Once again the 3 big boxes are made up of the middle three colours. The drop down boxes are made up of the darkest colour and the middle colour.

I've attached the png & aco files of the palette, and some mock up screen shots.

Sorry to be a pain.

Mark
0432663993









Hi Mark,

We have revised the colours on the home page for your review, here is the link:
https://staging-drmarkboccola.kinsta.cloud/

Please let us know what you think and if all good, we will apply to the rest of the site.


Thanks,

Heath Maguire
support@wpperk.com
